select count(*) from post as p
and p.author_id = #{userId}

select count(*) from post as p inner join user as u on u.user_id = p.author_id
and u.username = #{username}

select p.post_id as post_id, p.title as title, p.content as content, p.author_id as author_id, p.tag_id as tag_id, t.id as t_id, t.name as t_name from post as p left join post_tag as pt on pt.post_id = p.post_id left join tag as t on t.id = pt.tag_id
and p.post_id = #{id}
